title: Bug 124066 in context menu, insert chart is not translated into Chinese
description: Bug 124066 in context menu, insert chart is not translated into Chinese
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the option for 'insert chart' is not translated into Chinese.
EB: Expect the 'insert chart' option in the context menu to be translated into Chinese.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a report in a Chinese environment.
